name: Choices- Death is the only ending
name_original: Choices- Death is the only ending
description:
Disclaimer- this is intended to be a dark game, dealing with serious topics such as depression, anxiety, mental health, suicide, death, loss of loved one 

-

"No, that's not it. That's not right."

How I've felt for so long. 

Eve struggles with depression, anxiety and many deep and dark emotions. One day, she begins to have weird dreams, forcing her to make moral choices. Her actions in real life can alter these dreams. But how? and why?

Could there be a way out of the endless dark?

-

Working on writing and adding

- a time system, where your actions take up time
- lots of choices 
- a well being/mental health meter, which is impacted by various elements such as hunger, sleep, motivation and more
- dreams

Follow me on twitteror tumblr for more constant updates
